verses.text: \w Simon|strong="G4826"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, a \w servant|strong="G1401"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* an \w apostle|strong="G0652"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, to them that have \w obtained|strong="G2975"\w* like \w precious|strong="G2472"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* with \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* the \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Saviour|strong="G4990"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*:

\w Grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* be \w multiplied|strong="G4129"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* the \w knowledge|strong="G1922"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*,

According \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w divine|strong="G2304"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w* hath \w given|strong="G1433"\w* unto \w us|strong="G2254"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \add pertain\add* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w godliness|strong="G2150"\w*, \w through|strong="G1223"\w* the \w knowledge|strong="G1922"\w* of him that hath \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w to|strong="G1223"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w virtue|strong="G0703"\w*:

\w Whereby|strong="G1223"\w* are \w given|strong="G1433"\w* unto \w us|strong="G2254"\w* exceeding \w great|strong="G3176"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w precious|strong="G5093"\w* \w promises|strong="G1862"\w*: \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w these|strong="G5130"\w* ye might \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w partakers|strong="G2844"\w* of \w the|strong="G5449"\w* \w divine|strong="G2304"\w* \w nature|strong="G5449"\w*, having \w escaped|strong="G0668"\w* the \w corruption|strong="G5356"\w* that is \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* \w lust|strong="G1939"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w beside|strong="G3923"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w*, \w giving|strong="G3923"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w diligence|strong="G4710"\w*, \w add|strong="G2023"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w virtue|strong="G0703"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w virtue|strong="G0703"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w*;

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w* \w temperance|strong="G1466"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w temperance|strong="G1466"\w* \w patience|strong="G5281"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w patience|strong="G5281"\w* \w godliness|strong="G2150"\w*;

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w godliness|strong="G2150"\w* brotherly \w kindness|strong="G5360"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* brotherly \w kindness|strong="G5360"\w* \w charity|strong="G0026"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G5225"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* \w be|strong="G5225"\w* in \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w abound|strong="G4121"\w*, they \w make|strong="G2525"\w* \add you that ye shall\add* \w neither|strong="G3756"\w* \add be\add* \w barren|strong="G0692"\w* \w nor|strong="G3761"\w* \w unfruitful|strong="G0175"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* the \w knowledge|strong="G1922"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1063"\w* he \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w lacketh|strong="G3918"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w blind|strong="G5185"\w*, and cannot see afar \w off|strong="G3467"\w*, and \w hath|strong="G2983"\w* \w forgotten|strong="G3024"\w* that he was \w purged|strong="G2512"\w* \w from|strong="G0266"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w old|strong="G3819"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* the \w rather|strong="G3123"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, give \w diligence|strong="G4704"\w* to \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w calling|strong="G2821"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w election|strong="G1589"\w* \w sure|strong="G0949"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* if ye \w do|strong="G4160"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*, ye \w shall|strong="G4417"\w* \w never|strong="G3756"\w* \w fall|strong="G4417"\w*:

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* an \w entrance|strong="G1529"\w* shall be \w ministered|strong="G2023"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w abundantly|strong="G4146"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w everlasting|strong="G0166"\w* \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Saviour|strong="G4990"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* I \w will|strong="G0272"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* be \w negligent|strong="G0272"\w* to \w put|strong="G5279"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w always|strong="G0104"\w* in \w remembrance|strong="G5279"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* these \w things|strong="G5130"\w*, \w though|strong="G2539"\w* ye \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \add them\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* be \w established|strong="G4741"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w present|strong="G3918"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*.

\w Yea|strong="G1161"\w*, I think \w it|strong="G2233"\w* \w meet|strong="G1342"\w*, as long \w as|strong="G3745"\w* I \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="G4638"\w*, to \w stir|strong="G1326"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w up|strong="G1326"\w* by \w putting|strong="G5280"\w* \add you\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w remembrance|strong="G5280"\w*;

\w Knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w shortly|strong="G5031"\w* I must put \w off|strong="G0595"\w* \add this\add* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="G4638"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* hath \w shewed|strong="G1213"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w*.

\w Moreover|strong="G1161"\w* I will endeavour \w that|strong="G4704"\w* \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* may be \w able|strong="G4160"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w my|strong="G1699"\w* \w decease|strong="G1841"\w* to \w have|strong="G2192"\w* these \w things|strong="G5130"\w* \w always|strong="G1539"\w* in \w remembrance|strong="G3420"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* we \w have|strong="G1811"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w followed|strong="G1811"\w* cunningly \w devised|strong="G4679"\w* \w fables|strong="G3454"\w*, when we made \w known|strong="G1107"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* the \w power|strong="G1411"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w coming|strong="G3952"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w were|strong="G1096"\w* \w eyewitnesses|strong="G2030"\w* \w of|strong="G3168"\w* \w his|strong="G1565"\w* \w majesty|strong="G3168"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* he \w received|strong="G2983"\w* \w from|strong="G3844"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w honour|strong="G5092"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*, when there \w came|strong="G5342"\w* \w such|strong="G5107"\w* a \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* to \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w from|strong="G5259"\w* \w the|strong="G1391"\w* \w excellent|strong="G3169"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*, \w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* am well \w pleased|strong="G2106"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* which \w came|strong="G5342"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w*, when we \w were|strong="G5607"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3735"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w mount|strong="G3735"\w*.

We \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G3056"\w* more \w sure|strong="G0949"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w prophecy|strong="G4397"\w*; \w whereunto|strong="G3739"\w* ye \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w well|strong="G2573"\w* that ye take \w heed|strong="G4337"\w*, as \w unto|strong="G5613"\w* a \w light|strong="G3088"\w* that \w shineth|strong="G5316"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w a|strong="G5117"\w* \w dark|strong="G0850"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w*, \w until|strong="G2193"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w dawn|strong="G1306"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the day \w star|strong="G5459"\w* \w arise|strong="G0393"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*:

\w Knowing|strong="G1097"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w first|strong="G4412"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w prophecy|strong="G4394"\w* of the \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w* \w is|strong="G1096"\w* \w of|strong="G1955"\w* \w any|strong="G3956"\w* \w private|strong="G2398"\w* \w interpretation|strong="G1955"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w prophecy|strong="G4394"\w* \w came|strong="G5342"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* in old \w time|strong="G4218"\w* by the \w will|strong="G2307"\w* of \w man|strong="G0444"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* \add as they were\add* \w moved|strong="G5342"\w* by \w the|strong="G4151"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*.
